00040 namespace dai {
00041 
00042 
00044 class InfAlg {
00045     public:
00047         virtual ~InfAlg() {}
00048 
00049     public:
00051         virtual InfAlg* clone() const = 0;
00052 
00054         virtual InfAlg* create() const = 0;
00055         
00057         virtual std::string identify() const = 0;
00058 
00060         virtual Factor belief( const Var &n ) const = 0;
00061 
00063         virtual Factor belief( const VarSet &n ) const = 0;
00064 
00066         virtual std::vector<Factor> beliefs() const = 0;
00067 
00069         virtual Real logZ() const = 0;
00070 
00072 
00074         virtual void init() = 0;
00075 
00077 
00080         virtual void init( const VarSet &ns ) = 0;
00081 
00083         /*  Before run() is called the first time, init() should be called.
00084          *  If run() returns successfully, the results can be queried using the methods belief(), beliefs() and logZ().
00085          */
00086         virtual double run() = 0;
00087 
00089         virtual void clamp( const Var & n, size_t i, bool backup = false ) = 0;
00090 
00092         virtual void makeCavity( size_t i, bool backup = false ) = 0;
00093 
00096         virtual double maxDiff() const = 0;
00097 
00100         virtual size_t Iterations() const = 0;
00101 
00102 
00104         virtual FactorGraph &fg() = 0;
00105 
00107         virtual const FactorGraph &fg() const = 0;
00108 
00110         virtual void backupFactor( size_t I ) = 0;
00112         virtual void backupFactors( const VarSet &ns ) = 0;
00113 
00115         virtual void restoreFactor( size_t I ) = 0;
00117         virtual void restoreFactors( const VarSet &ns ) = 0;
00118 };

00122 
00124 template <class GRM>
00125 class DAIAlg : public InfAlg, public GRM {
00126     public:
00128         DAIAlg() : InfAlg(), GRM() {}
00129         
00131         DAIAlg( const GRM &grm ) : InfAlg(), GRM(grm) {}
00132 
00134         DAIAlg( const DAIAlg & x ) : InfAlg(x), GRM(x) {}
00135 
00137         DAIAlg & operator=( const DAIAlg &x ) {
00138             if( this != &x ) {
00139                 InfAlg::operator=(x);
00140                 GRM::operator=(x);
00141             }
00142             return *this;
00143         }
00144 
00146         void backupFactor( size_t I ) { GRM::backupFactor( I ); }
00148         void backupFactors( const VarSet &ns ) { GRM::backupFactors( ns ); }
00149 
00151         void restoreFactor( size_t I ) { GRM::restoreFactor( I ); }
00153         void restoreFactors( const VarSet &ns ) { GRM::restoreFactors( ns ); }
00154 
00156         void clamp( const Var & n, size_t i, bool backup = false ) { GRM::clamp( n, i, backup ); }
00157 
00159         void makeCavity( size_t i, bool backup = false ) { GRM::makeCavity( i, backup ); }
00160 
00162         FactorGraph &fg() { return (FactorGraph &)(*this); }
00163 
00165         const FactorGraph &fg() const { return (const FactorGraph &)(*this); }
00166 };
